channel.title: 317 client --read here
channel.description:
hi there
this is not a request i just wanted to ask where I can download a good client for my server. the current one sucks :P WHy? because the water is lava everywhere, how do I change this? And I cant find Modicons.jag/.png in Sprites or cache or somewhere else?

item.title: 317 client --read here
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“durial12, post:5, topic:390316”]The title is 317 CLIENT <-- That’s not a server.

And thats because your client is stupid and has the wrong models/it doesn’t correspond with your server.[/quote]

You have no idea what you’re saying.

The reason the water is lava is probably because where the client handles the floor rendering, someone change the water texture to lava. I can’t remember where it is exactly, but if you use the search button, you can probably find a post back a few years when people were just finding out about it. There’s probably a tutorial on how to change it to lava as well.

Read full topic
